# Auto Parts Inventory Management System - Project Setup

## Project Overview
Full-stack web application for tracking and managing auto parts inventory. Built with:
- **Frontend**: React + TypeScript + Vite
- **Backend**: Express.js + Node.js
- **Database**: SQLite

## Key Features
- Parts inventory tracking
- Part categories and specifications
- Stock quantity monitoring
- Part pricing and cost tracking
- Search and filtering
- Basic inventory reports

## Setup Progress
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Configure environment
- [ ] Start development servers
- [ ] Access application at http://localhost:5173
